name: Airship Music Demo
description:
Game demo that showcases an airship like music, for games like flight simulators, rpg airships, spaceships and more.

You can switch cam view by pressing the button "Switch Cam", at the upper left.

All assets (except for the music) are from Unity Standard Assets

Cameras are being handled by CineMachine.

Game made by Raúl Ibarra Aranda. Music and sound effects made by www.soundxp.net Copyright: Gamingsoft Ltd. All Rights Reserved.
